intent_atoms.description: Implement traversal guard enforcement inside StreamingBoxWalker to honor budgets defined in Traversal_Guard_Requirements.md and maintain strict mode behavior.
Traversal guard enforcement must correctly enforce budgets as specified in Traversal_Guard_Requirements.md.
Strict mode behavior remains unchanged after adding traversal guard enforcement.
Add corrupt fixtures (zero-size-loop.mp4, nested uuid stack, overlapping children) to the fixture catalog and integrate them into unit, integration, and fuzz harnesses.
Corrupt fixtures are added to the fixture catalog.
Unit, integration, and fuzz harnesses use the new corrupt fixtures.
Update CLI/UI issue presenters to localize new guard.* codes and display guard counts in integrity summaries.
CLI/UI issue presenters localize all new guard.* codes.
Capture guard activation metrics in tolerant parsing dashboards to allow QA track hit rates across fuzz campaigns.
Guard activation metrics are captured and displayed in the dashboard.
